```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(DT)
table_count_satisfaction <- read_csv("data-raw/table_count_satisfaction.csv")
```

* Mis à jour le `r today()`.

## Part des contrôles satisfaisants

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='markup'}
table_count_satisfaction %>% 
  group_by(Synthese_eval_sanit) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n)) %>%
  mutate(share = 100 * n / sum(n)) %>%
  datatable()
```

## Evolution des contrôles

```{r echo=FALSE}
table_count_satisfaction %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd(date)
    ) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = date, y = n)) + 
  scale_x_date() + 
  scale_y_continuous()
```

## Evolution de la part des contrôles

```{r}
table_count_satisfaction %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd(date),
    month_year = ymd(paste(year(date), month(date), "01", sep = "-"))
    ) %>%
  group_by(Synthese_eval_sanit, month_year) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n)) %>%
  group_by(month_year) %>%
  mutate(share = 100 * n/sum(n)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(
    mapping = aes(x = month_year, y = share)
  ) + 
  facet_wrap(~ Synthese_eval_sanit)
```

```{r}
table_count_satisfaction %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd(date),
    month_year = ymd(paste(year(date), month(date), "01", sep = "-"))
    ) %>%
  group_by(Synthese_eval_sanit, month_year) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n)) %>%
  group_by(month_year) %>%
  mutate(share = 100 * n/sum(n)) %>%
  datatable()
```
